самая ущербская игра 2022 года, нахуй я на неё потратил более 400 часов

CS has always been my go to game. Best fps out there. The only problem is that the game has been dying lately. I've had to wait at least 10 minutes between every ranked match. Would definitely recommend this game anyone who enjoys fps games. Also consider getting prime status so you don't have to put up with lots of hackers every now and then.

The number of players using cheats is too high. 8 out of 10 games have at least one cheating player. Usually you see them disconnecting in the warm up period or after few round were they can't do any frag. They enable the cheats and it is like they enabled the "God" mode. Lately because of many reports was found that if they win 16-0 all the matches there will look suspicious and their game could get reviewed. Now they allow people to win somewhere between 6 and 10 rounds to remove initial doubts and fool some new players.
There VAC system should be improved and to not allow the minimizing. If you minimize you get 30 minutes ban first time, then 2 hours and further 3 ranks down at every minimize action (or alt+tab).
I played almost 1000 hours just for fun but the amount of cheaters is increasing and cuts the fun from the game and the result is just another stress and stupid competition for 90% of the players.
If you want fun just play with your friends on a LAN or over the internet in a special room. Other than that thumbs down for not being able to mitigate this kind of issues in the online game.
I even bet the so called professionals could be beaten by any 8 years old kid if allowed.
